mapper.insert: insert into sys_facilities_appointment( code, estate_id, facilities_manage_id, status, appointment_id, appointment_start_date, appointment_end_date, create_id, create_date )values ( #{code}, #{estateId}, #{facilitiesManageId}, #{status}, #{appointmentId}, #{appointmentStartDate}, #{appointmentEndDate}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_facilities_appointment where DATE(create_date) = DATE(#{date})
